description: SORN is a service within vehicle licensing, which also covers tax disc.
title: Statutory Off Road Notification

transaction.title: Make a SORN (Statutory Off Road Notification)

description-extra: This transactional service is for declaring that your vehicle is not being driven on the roads â€“ a Statutory Off Road Notification. <abbr title='Statutory Off Road Notification'>SORN</abbr>s must be made for a registered vehicle that is not being used on the road, and which has been taxed since 31 January 1998.
other-notes: The volume and cost data presented here is subject to change as the method of calculation is refined. Until it has been through a formal assurance process, care should be taken in using the data to support analysis of DVLA business.

modules.title: Users on start page
modules.description: Users currently on the GOV.UK start page for the service
info: Shows the estimated number of users currently on the GOV.UK start page for the service.

modules.title: User satisfaction
info: User satisfaction is measured by surveying a sample of users at the point of transaction completion. It is measured on a five-point scale, from most satisfied to least satisfied. The mean of these responses is converted to a percentage for display purposes.

modules.title: Applications breakdown
modules.description: SORN applications per month broken into digital, Post Office and DVLA centre applications
info: Shows the monthly number of SORNs received by the DVLA, broken into digital, Post Office and DVLA centre applications
Digital and automated phone: applications made online or using the automated telephone service
Post Office: applications made at a Post Office branch
DVLA centre: applications made at local DVLA centres

modules.title: Recorded errors
modules.description: Errors generated during the online application process last week

modules.title: Service availability
info: Page load time measures the time taken for a sample page within the service to load.
Uptime measures the percentage of time that the service was observed to be available.
